title: MBMBaM 614: Bigfoot Historical Site
description:
We’ve been struck by a terrifying possibility: what if we’re all just pretending to think? Does that mean that we don’t really exist? How do you know the difference between actually thinking and only acting like you’re thinking? Who knew acting like a Furby could cause this much existential dread.

Suggested talking points: Dino Park, Jujubee, Electronic Flour Bag, Building a Mystery, Bugs Vizier

Fairness West Virginia: https://fairnesswv.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
